text: @sagarikaghose Have u gone mad or what ? What kind of journalism you are doing ? Don’t print rubbish and misuse the act of freedom / freedom of speech ok ... just look at america the number of deaths due to covid-19 u wish same to happen here ? So much anger and ago against modi govt ?
